name: ultrasound-money
title: Ultrasound Money Dashboard
description:
Ethereum statistics dashboard from www.ultrasound.money

All stats update every 90 seconds
author: Osprey

commands.name: price
commands.title: Price
commands.description: Displays Ethereum price (USD, USD 1 Day % Change, ETHBTC), % of flippening and current base fee.

commands.name: burn
commands.title: Burn
commands.description: Displays Ether burned in USD and annualized issuance rates based on 1, 7 and 30 day averages.

commands.name: activity
commands.title: Activity
commands.description: Displays the top three Ethereum smart contracts based on ETH burned in the past hour.
